pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Collection comprises 135 15-minute episodes of Freedom Story, a radio program produced by Spiritual Mobilization, Inc., from 1951 to 1956. The programs feature dramatizations on conservative and libertarian themes and commentary.
